txt.en: 'The Battle of Greenfields took place nearly three hundred years ago, just a short distance to the north.'
'Bandobras Took, the great Bullroarer, was tall enough to ride a horse! Can you believe it?'
'The evil Golfimbul led his goblins into the Shire a long time ago, but was soundly defeated by the Bullroarer.'
'The club that Bullroarer used in the Battle of Greenfields is kept in the Mathom-house at Michel Delving.'
